Verses.18: Now as Jesus was walking by the Sea of Galilee, He saw two brothers: Simon, called Peter, and his brother Andrew. They were fishermen, casting a net into the sea.
Verses.19: He said to them, "Follow me, and I will make you fishers of people."
Verses.20: Immediately, they left their nets and followed Him.
Verses.21: Going on from there, He saw another two brothers: James, son of Zebedee, and his brother John. They were in a boat with their father, Zebedee, mending their nets. He called to them.
Verses.22: They immediately left the boat, and their father, and followed Him.

Changes: 2024-01-30 - Paul Prins: First translation of verses 18-22.
